price: بێگومان ئەم بێ بڕوایانە دونیای بێ بەقایان خۆش دەوێ وە پشت گوێی دەخەن ڕۆژێکی قورس وگران (کە قیامەتە)
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi yuḥibbūna al-ʿājilata wayadharūna warāahum yawman thaqīlan
